text: Saint-Jean-des-Essartiers is a former commune. It is found in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune of Val de Drôme.Arrêté préfectoral 26 September 2016 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Saint-Jean-des-Essartiers
